title: Win/Mac版：AE脚本：人物角色骨骼绑定脚本 Duduf Duik v15.08 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: Duik是DuDuF出品的动力学和动画工具，其基本工具包含反向动力学、骨骼变形器等，让创建动画变得更简单，支持Win/Mac系统下的Adobe After Effects。Duik 15.08新版更新了修改错误BUG。此脚本还具备反向运动学、骨骼和傀儡工具、自适应操控、操控工具、动画工具等功能，且支持多语言切换为中文。

download_links.name: Win/Mac版：AE脚本：人物角色骨骼绑定脚本 Duik 15.08
脚本使用操作教程下载

other.script_english_introduction: Duik has been conceived to be as simple and user friendly as possible. However, rigging can be a complex work, and we are aware of that.DuDuF IK & Animation Tools. The essential tools for the animation on After Effects: Autorig, Cinématique inverse (IK), Bones, Morphers, Dynamics……https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/duik-15–2#/
